#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>

using namespace std;

int encore(int no)
{
    int sum=no,x;

    while(no>0)
        {
            x=no%10;
            sum+=x;
            no=no/10;
        }
    return sum;

}

int main()
{
    int t,i,n,minpos;

    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n;
        int a[n+1];

        for(i=0;i<n+1;i++)
        {
            a[i]=encore(i);
            //cout<<a[i]<<" ";
        }

        minpos=n+1;
        for(i=n+1;i>0;i--)
        {
            if(a[i]==n)
                if(i<minpos)
                    minpos=i;
        }

        if(minpos>n)
            cout<<"NONE"<<endl;
        else
            cout<<minpos<<endl;
    }

  return 0;
}
